price: 26. A-Nabiyow cus :Nabii Ibraahimih qari arac (kaqbá kinnuk) nescesseeh Baxxaqqa, kaah hayneeh kaa xisaay yoo inkittitoysaay yot agleh tu- mahaysin kaak axcuk kaa amrisne, kaadu yi-Qarit tawaafah meekita maraay kaal, salaatah soolaah rukuuquuy, sujuud aba marah kaa taahirros (saytunnos) kaak inne waqdi.
arabic: وَإِذۡ بَوَّأۡنَا لِإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ مَكَانَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ أَن لَّا تُشۡرِكۡ بِي شَيۡـٔٗا وَطَهِّرۡ بَيۡتِيَ لِلطَّآئِفِينَ وَٱلۡقَآئِمِينَ وَٱلرُّكَّعِ ٱلسُّجُودِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh bawwanā li-ib'rāhīma makāna al-bayti an lā tush'rik bī shayan waṭahhir baytiya lilṭṭāifīna wal-qāimīna wal-rukaʿi al-sujūdi
